content.raw:
1) Edit ground plane: visual and collision previews look fine on the editor

2.A) Save and Exit -> plane falls with gravity

2.B) Open inspector, don't change anything, apply -> plane becomes thicker and if you save and exit, it becomes a unit box and falls
content.html:
1) Edit ground plane: visual and collision previews look fine on the editor

2.A) Save and Exit -> plane falls with gravity

2.B) Open inspector, don't change anything, apply -> plane becomes thicker and if you save and exit, it becomes a unit box and falls
